testcase.name: Adding a task to an empty list
testcase.system-out: Given the todoMVC site is open in the browser...............................passed Given a list with 0 tasks...................................................passed When a task is added........................................................passed Then 1 task is visible in the list..........................................passed And the number of items counter is set to 1.................................passed And the filters are displayed...............................................passed

testcase.name: Adding a task to a non-empty list
testcase.system-out: Given the todoMVC site is open in the browser...............................passed Given a list with 1 tasks...................................................passed When a task is added........................................................passed Then 2 task is visible in the list..........................................passed And the number of items counter is set to 2.................................passed

testcase.name: Editing a task
testcase.system-out: Given the todoMVC site is open in the browser...............................passed Given a list with 1 tasks...................................................passed When the task is edited.....................................................passed Then the edited task is visible in the list.................................passed And the number of items counter is set to 1.................................passed

testcase.name: Completing a task
testcase.system-out: Given the todoMVC site is open in the browser...............................passed Given a list with 2 tasks...................................................passed When 1 task is marked as completed..........................................passed Then the task is checked off from the list..................................passed And the number of items counter is set to 1.................................passed And the option to clear completed tasks is available........................passed

testcase.name: Filter tasks
testcase.system-out: Given the todoMVC site is open in the browser...............................passed Given a list with 2 tasks...................................................passed And 1 task is marked as completed...........................................passed When "Active" filter is selected............................................passed Then "Active" tasks are displayed...........................................passed And the number of items counter is set to 1.................................passed

testcase.name: Filter tasks 2
testcase.system-out: Given the todoMVC site is open in the browser...............................passed Given a list with 2 tasks...................................................passed And 1 task is marked as completed...........................................passed When "Completed" filter is selected.........................................passed Then "Completed" tasks are displayed........................................passed And the number of items counter is set to 1.................................passed

testcase.name: Filter tasks 3
testcase.system-out: Given the todoMVC site is open in the browser...............................passed Given a list with 2 tasks...................................................passed And 1 task is marked as completed...........................................passed When "All" filter is selected...............................................passed Then "All" tasks are displayed..............................................passed And the number of items counter is set to 1.................................passed

testcase.name: Clear Completed tasks
testcase.system-out: Given the todoMVC site is open in the browser...............................passed Given a list with 2 tasks...................................................passed And 1 task is marked as completed...........................................passed When completed tasks are cleared............................................passed Then the completed tasks are not displayed..................................passed But the active tasks are displayed..........................................passed And the number of items counter is set to 1.................................passed

testcase.name: Delete task
testcase.system-out: Given the todoMVC site is open in the browser...............................passed Given a list with 2 tasks...................................................passed And 1 task is marked as completed...........................................passed When "Completed" task is deleted............................................passed Then "Completed" tasks is not displayed.....................................passed And the number of items counter is set to 1.................................passed

testcase.name: Delete task 2
testcase.system-out: Given the todoMVC site is open in the browser...............................passed Given a list with 2 tasks...................................................passed And 1 task is marked as completed...........................................passed When "Active" task is deleted...............................................passed Then "Active" tasks is not displayed........................................passed And the number of items counter is set to 0.................................passed

testcase.name: Mark all tasks as completed
testcase.system-out: Given the todoMVC site is open in the browser...............................passed Given a list with 2 tasks...................................................passed When All the tasks are marked completed.....................................passed Then the tasks are checked off from the list................................passed And the number of items counter is set to 0.................................passed
